nodes.text: Imperial Edict 936 was passed during the Cold War by the Empire regarding the tombs of the Valley of the Dark Lords on Korriban.

In response to raiders looting tombs on Korriban the Empire issued this edict to deal with the new threat to the Sith homeworld. The edict specifically authorized the use of "deadly force" against tomb raiders found looting. Sergeant Rikel of the Imperial Army was ordered to carry out to this order and sent in his men to clear Ajunta Pall's tomb. His units were killed and the tomb was later cleared by a Sith Acolyte.
